title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Modern SFTP: Deploy AWS Transfer Family, Identity, and Automation (STG419)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 现代化 SFTP：部署 AWS Transfer Family、身份管理和自动化 (STG419)
abstract: Learn to build enterprise-grade file transfer solutions using AWS Transfer Family with automated workflows and Infrastructure as Code using Terraform. This session covers building secure SFTP servers, integrating with enterprise identity providers like Okta and Azure AD, and automating file processing workflows such as security scanning with GuardDuty and leveraging agentic AI to transform business processes. Perfect for organizations looking to modernize their managed file transfer systems while maintaining security and compliance. Walk away with practical templates and patterns for implementing enterprise-grade file transfer solutions.
abstract_cn: 学习使用 AWS Transfer Family 构建企业级文件传输解决方案，包含自动化工作流程和使用 Terraform 的基础设施即代码。本课程涵盖构建安全的 SFTP 服务器、与 Okta 和 Azure AD 等企业身份提供商集成，以及自动化文件处理工作流程，例如使用 GuardDuty 进行安全扫描和利用智能体 AI 转变业务流程。非常适合希望在保持安全性和合规性的同时实现托管文件传输系统现代化的组织。您将获得用于实施企业级文件传输解决方案的实用模板和模式。
